item.title: Tiny Mapper: Part One
item.description: Introduction Welcome, everyone, to part one of a series of blog posts about creating a tiny manual mapper. Our goal by the end of the series is to use our knowledge of PE (Portable Executable) files, and their relationship with the Windows loader, to create a basic DLL (Dynamic-Link Library) manual mapper in modern C. I expect readers to be somewhat experienced with the basics of C programming, and the Windows API.
